NewsArticle.Title: Chadul Rising - Help from the Gods
NewsArticle.Content:
In fears that Chadul cannot be kept at bay, the mundanes for each town have reconstructed each temple to strengthen the power of the Gods. Architects have sought inspiration from both Temuair and Medenia in this renovation.
All aislings that follow a faith can attend mass more often and are encouraged to do so.
Reports have been seen that certain aislings being granted powerful items from the deity they follow and any of his or her allies.
